gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 128, Bulls 117
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Bulls, 128-117. Jalen Brunson led the way with 45 points (7-12 3PM), eight assists, and three rebounds for the Knicks, with OG Anunoby (24 points, four 3PM) and Donte DiVincenzo (21 points, six assists) combining for 45 points in the victory. DeMar DeRozan tallied 34 points, six assists, and five rebounds for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Knicks improve to 47-32, while the Bulls fall to 37-42.
